JavaScript Pagination

Pagination enhances the usability of a web page that is displaying way too much information all at once. Long lists don't make for a good user experience on a web page. This was one of the first projects completed in the Full Stack Tech degree and pagination was implemented by manipulating CSS classes. If I were to rewrite the project today I would be able to accomplish the task much easier with higher order array functions.
